  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_2cc2ef8edf3fac49bc3ec45d4aef435f6fa43d94</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_2cc2ef8edf3fac49bc3ec45d4aef435f6fa43d94</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Substances from alkali materials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substanzen von den Alkalimaterialien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Substances des matériaux d'alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substâncias dos materiais do alcalóide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sostanze dai materiali dell'alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσίες από τα αλκαλικά υλικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sustancias de los materiales del álcali</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that alkali substances form the basic ingredient of soaps. Wood ash was once used by people back when soap was not yet invented.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wood ash</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt diesem 
Alkalisubstanzformular den grundlegenden Bestandteil der Seifen. 
Hölzerne Asche wurde einmal von den Leuten zurück benutzt, als
Seife nicht noch erfunden wurde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à cette forme de 
substances d'alcali l'ingrédient de base des savons. La cendre 
en bois a été par le passé employée par des personnes en arrière 
quand du savon n'a pas été encore inventé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a esse formulário das 
substâncias do alcalóide o ingrediente básico dos sabões. A 
cinza de madeira foi usada uma vez por povos para trás quando o 
sabão não foi inventado ainda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra a quella forma delle 
sostanze dell'alcali l'ingrediente di base dei saponi. La cenere
di legno è stata usata una volta dalla gente indietro quando il 
sapone ancora non è stato inventato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι αλκαλικές ουσίες 
διαμορφώνουν το βασικό συστατικό των σαπουνιών. Η ξύλινη 
τέφρα χρησιμοποιήθηκε μιά φορά από τους ανθρώπους πίσω όταν 
δεν εφευρέθηκε ακόμα το σαπούνι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a esa forma de las 
sustancias del álcali el ingrediente básico de jabones. La 
ceniza de madera fue utilizada una vez por la gente detrás cuando el 
jabón todavía no fue inventado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaliumhydroxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seife</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hölzerne Asche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hydroxyde de potassium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">savon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cendre en bois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hydroxide do potassium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sabão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cinza de madeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">idrossido del potassio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sapone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cenere di legno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υδροξείδιο καλίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σαπούνι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξύλινη τέφρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hidróxido del potasio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">jabón</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ceniza de madera</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
